TopicTitle: PS4 only camera aim possible on eva

Articles.Content: Relatively new ps4 player here. I successfully completed my first Mun landing. Did an EVA. Now that my Kerbal is on the surface, the only option I get when I click on my science junior, goo, etc. is “Aim Camera”. I tried every button combination I could think of, but I can’t get any other options. So I can’t  perform experiments or collect data. Any help would be be appreciated!
